comment.name: AntdSliderBar
comment.title: 侧边导航
comment.usage: 需要用户快速导航至某一项内容集合，并可以在多个内容之间来回切换。

properties.name: styleBuilder
properties.funcSig: AntdSliderBarStyle Function(BuildContext context, AntdSliderBar widget, AntdSliderBarStyle defaultStyle, AntdAliasToken token)

properties.name: onEdgeReached
properties.description: 当触碰到边界时的回调

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: 根据方向自动优化视图边界

demos.name: AntdSliderBarDemo
demos.title: 事件

demos.name: AntdSliderBarStyleDemo
demos.title: 自定义样式
demos.description: 通过style 可以覆盖默认样式

demos.name: AntdSliderBarBigContentDemo
demos.title: 超多内容填满
demos.description: 每个页面可以自己适应内容的高度
demos.body:
class AntdSliderBarBigContentDemo extends StatelessWidget {
  const AntdSliderBarBigContentDemo({super.key});
  @override
  Widget build(BuildContext context) {
    return DemoWrapper(child: [
      SizedBox(
          height: 500,
          child: AntdSliderBar(
              style: const AntdSliderBarStyle(
                  activeCornerRadius: 0, bodyStyle: AntdBoxStyle(width: 150)),
              items: [
                AntdSliderBarItem(
                    value: "1",
                    content:
                        _Child(title: "选项1", desc: generateRandomString(1000)),
                    title: const Text("我是标题1")),
                AntdSliderBarItem(
                    value: "2",
                    disabled: true,
                    content:
                        _Child(title: "选项2", desc: generateRandomString(1200)),
                    title: const Text("我是标题2")),
                AntdSliderBarItem(
                    value: "3",
                    content:
                        _Child(title: "选项3", desc: generateRandomString(1400)),
                    title: const Text("我是标题3")),
                AntdSliderBarItem(
                    value: "4",
                    content:
                        _Child(title: "选项4", desc: generateRandomString(200)),
                    title: const Text("我是标题4"))
              ]))
    ]);
  }
}

comment.name: AntdSliderBarStyle
comment.title: 滑动选择器(SliderBar)的样式配置

properties.name: inherit
properties.description: 是否继承样式,如果为false则不会向上合并其他的样式

properties.name: contentStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的标题样式

properties.name: titleStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的标题样式

properties.name: indicatorStyle
properties.description: 未选中状态的指示器样式

properties.name: activeIndicatorStyle
properties.description: 选中状态的指示器样式

properties.name: activeCornerRadius
properties.description: 选中项的圆角半径（单位：像素）

comment.name: AntdSliderBarItem
comment.title: 滑动选择器(SliderBar)的单个选项定义

properties.name: content
properties.description: 自定义内容组件（优先级高于title）

properties.name: title
properties.description: 默认标题内容（当content为空时使用）
